column4: Anyone have any idea how to fix sound for flash in Firefox? I've tried the 2 solutions listed in the forums, I do not have a firefoxrc file and setting up the alsa stuff didn't appear to help.
You could try replacing ALSA with PulseAudio
Whenn you test to see if it works, make sure you don't and didn't have other applications open that output audio. With ALSA apps using sound can interfere with one another.
